SELECT LCT_ID , LCT_NM FROM LCT_CD
WHERE LCT_ID LIKE '%' || #{lctId} || '-%'
ORDER BY LCT_ID ASC

SELECT L.LCT_ID , L.LCT_NM FROM LCT_CD L WHERE L.LCT_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT C.LCT_ID FROM CTY_CD C INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT STR_CTY FROM STR WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND DEL_YN = 'N') S ON C.CTY_ID = S.STR_CTY) ORDER BY L.LCT_NM ASC
